metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16737 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
tinc before 1.0.30 has a broken authentication protocol, without even a partial mitigation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16737` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tinc - 1.0.35-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tinc package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.35-2build1').
